title: Testing different functionalities

content:
Introduction:
Introduction of the two key legal philosophies: Antonin Scaliaâ€™s textualist and originalist approach versus Ronald Dworkinâ€™s interpretative method. Brief overview of the case United States v. Rahimi â€œbecauseâ€¦â€ motivation: argue for the superiority of one approach over the other Thesis statement: Argue why Scaliaâ€™s approach is superior in interpreting statutes, particularly in the context of Second Amendment cases like United States v. Rahimi
title: Test

content: Space representation in reliefs (military campaigns) Ashurnasirpalâ€™s throne room worms eye perspective Tiglath-Pileser III, Sargon II, Sennacherib Restricted perspective breaks down, shifts into more relaxed perspective Ashurbanipal Redecorating Sennacheribâ€™s palace Went back to registers (but in a weird way) - playful? e.g. Instead of standard inscriptions in between registers, there is a river - birdâ€™s eye view? Use of empty space Emotional & charged empty spaces? Some are confusing & inexplicable (looks unnecessary)? Proposition: to draw attention, to separate different groups, etc
